quote0.quote: Gentlemen, you can't fight in here! This is the war room!
quote0.speaker: President Merkin Muffley

quote1.quote: Search your feelings. You know it to be true.
quote1.speaker: Darth Vader
quote1.movie: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back

quote2.quote: Do or do not. There is no try.
quote2.speaker: Yoda
quote2.movie: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back

quote3.quote: Say hello to my little friend!
quote3.speaker: Tony Montana

quote4.quote: Snakes. Why'd it have to be snakes?
quote4.speaker: Indiana Jones

quote5.quote: I feel the need...the need for speed!
quote5.speaker: Maverick

quote6.quote: It's not the years, honey, it's the mileage.
quote6.speaker: Indiana Jones

quote7.quote: Human sacrifice. Dogs and cats living together. Mass hysteria.
quote7.speaker: Peter Venkman

quote10.quote: Fear leads to anger, anger leads to hate, hate leads to suffering.
quote10.speaker: Yoda

quote11.quote: Quiet! And there's a fresh one if you mouth off again.
quote11.speaker: K-2SO

quote13.quote: Life moves pretty fast. If you don't stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it.
quote13.speaker: Ferris Bueller

quote14.quote: I'm sorry, Dave. I'm afraid I can't do that.
quote14.speaker: HAL

quote15.quote: I love the smell of napalm in the morning.
quote15.speaker: Lt. Col. Bill Kilgore

quote16.quote: I'm having an old friend for dinner.
quote16.speaker: Hannibal Lecter
